title: The Man who can't stop
creator_credit: Film Australia, ONF | NFB, Tom Daly, Richard Mason and Michael Rubbo
brief_description: Tells of the efforts of Francis Sutton to save the Australian coastline from pollution. Dedicated to this task Sutton works ceaselessly on maps, diagrams and plans in an attempt to find an alternative to the disposal of sewage through ocean outfalls. Though receiving many rebuffs, gradually he is gaining support, from a scientist, politician and from the people who live around him. Cinematography by Don McAlpine.
